job_title: Intern - DRAM Quality Data Analytics Engineer
job_description:
• We will assign you a keystone project to develop critical thinking and problem solving skills while exposing you to key challenges in semiconductor manufacturing.
• We will partner you with an experienced member of the team to ensure your project is successful.
• SENIOR ENGINEER - Global Quality DEMQRA COMPUTE DRAM Product Quality and Reliability AssuranceTaichung City, Taichung City, TaiwanPosted a year ago Deep understanding of statistics applied to data analysis, especially in the area of reliability Candidates must still be enrolled in school and have a graduation date after September 2026.
• Experience using Linux based operating systems and cloud computing systems (GCP, AWS, etc) Experience with data visualization software such as Tableau, PowerBI, JMP, etc.
• We will also give you short term projects to expose you to different areas within the company.
• You will give training to global teams on the tools you create and the insights you draw.
• We also want you to share code, knowledge and lessons learned to make sure the whole team is on the cutting edge.
• Familiarity with common semiconductor reliability tests and failure mechanisms Familiarity with basic DRAM operation and semiconductor manufacturing Working towards BS/MS/Ph.

• Experience with data visualization software such as Tableau, PowerBI, and especially streamlit Understanding of statistics applied to data analysis, especially in reliability Familiarity with common semiconductor reliability tests and failure mechanisms Familiarity with basic DRAM operation and semiconductor manufacturing MS/BS or equivalent experience in Electrical or Computer Engineering Experience deploying LLMs in a production environment Principal Product Engineer (Advance Data Analytics), Heterogeneous Integration Group (HIG), High Bandwidth Memory (HBM) Product EngineeringSingapore, SingaporePosted 2 months ago Intern - DRAM Quality Data Analytics EngineerBoise, Idaho, United States of AmericaPosted 15 hours ago SMAI Senior Data ScientistSingapore, SingaporePosted 4 months ago.
